verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> there are gathered together <S%G4863><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%>, who had come <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> had seen <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G5124><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> ate <S%G2068><s%> their bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G5495><s%> defiled <S%G2839><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, unwashen <S%G449><s%>, hands <S%G5495><s%>.

(For <S%G1063><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, except <S%G1437><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> diligently <S%G4435><s%>, eat <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, holding <S%G2902><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> when they come from <S%G575><s%> the marketplace <S%G58><s%>, except3362, 3361 they bathe <S%G907><s%> themselves <S%G2068><s%>, they eat not <S%G3756><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> there are <S%G2076><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> they have received <S%G3880><s%> to hold <S%G2902><s%>, washings <S%G909><s%> of cups <S%G4221><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pots <S%G3582><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brasen vessels <S%G5473><s%>.)

And <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G1223><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> their bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G5495><s%> defiled <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G3754><s%>, Well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honoreth <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with <S%G5491><s%> their lips <S%G5491><s%>, But <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, Teaching <S%G1321><s%> as their doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the precepts <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.
Ye <S%G1063><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hold <S%G2902><s%> fast the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Full well <S%G2573><s%> do ye reject <S%G114><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may keep <S%G5083><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Honor <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%>, He that speaketh evil <S%G2551><s%> of father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%>, That <S%G3739><s%> wherewith <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest have been profited <S%G5623><s%> by <S%G3739><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is Corban <S%G2878><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> is to say <S%G2076><s%>, Given to God <S%G1435><s%>;

ye <S%G2532><s%> no longer <S%G3765><s%> suffer <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> aught <S%G3762><s%> for <S%G3962><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>;

making <S%G208><s%> void <S%G208><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye have delivered <S%G3860><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> ye do <S%G4160><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> to him the <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> again <S%G3004><s%>, and said unto them <S%G846><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of you <S%G2532><s%>, and understand <S%G4920><s%>:

there is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> going <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> the things which proceed out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the man <S%G846><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> that <S%G2076><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G4012><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>? Perceive <S%G3539><s%> ye <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> goeth <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, it <S%G1410><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;

because <S%G3754><s%> it goeth <S%G1531><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his belly <S%G2836><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> goeth out <S%G1607><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%>? This he said <S%G2511><s%>, making all <S%G3956><s%> meats clean <S%G1033><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G3754><s%>, That which proceedeth out <S%G1607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>, that <S%G1565><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%>, out <S%G1537><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, evil <S%G2556><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%>, fornications <S%G4202><s%>, thefts <S%G2829><s%>, murders <S%G5408><s%>, adulteries <S%G3430><s%>,

covetings <S%G4124><s%>, wickednesses <S%G4189><s%>, deceit <S%G1388><s%>, lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, an <S%G3788><s%> evil <S%G4189><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%>, railing <S%G988><s%>, pride <S%G5243><s%>, foolishness <S%G877><s%>:
all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> evil things <S%G4190><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> from within <S%G2081><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%>, and went <S%G565><s%> away into <S%G1519><s%> the borders <S%G3181><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%>, and would have <S%G2309><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> it <S%G2532><s%>; and he could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be hid <S%G2990><s%>.

But <S%G1063><s%> straightway a <S%G1135><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> little daughter <S%G2365><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> an <S%G4151><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, came <S%G2064><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> down at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>.

Now the woman <S%G1135><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a Greek <S%G1674><s%>, a Syrophoenician <S%G4949><s%> by race <S%G1085><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> she besought <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would cast forth <S%G1544><s%> the demon <S%G1140><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of <S%G2364><s%> her <S%G846><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, Let <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be filled <S%G5526><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%>'s bread <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> it to the dogs <S%G2952><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> she answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Yea <S%G3483><s%>, Lord <S%G2532><s%>; even <S%G1063><s%> the dogs <S%G2952><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the table <S%G5132><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%>'s crumbs <S%G5589><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%>; the demon <S%G1140><s%> is gone out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> she went <S%G565><s%> away unto <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the child laid <S%G906><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the bed <S%G2825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the demon <S%G1140><s%> gone out <S%G1831><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G1537><s%> the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> through Sidon <S%G4605><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, through <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the borders <S%G3725><s%> of Decapolis <S%G1179><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they bring <S%G5342><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> one that was deaf <S%G2974><s%>, and had an impediment in his speech <S%G3424><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they beseech <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> lay <S%G2007><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> upon <S%G2007><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> aside2596, 2398 from <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> privately <S%G906><s%>, and put his <S%G846><s%> fingers <S%G1147><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he spat <S%G4429><s%>, and touched <S%G680><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> looking up <S%G308><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, he sighed <S%G4727><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Ephphatha <S%G2188><s%>, that <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, Be opened <S%G1272><s%>.

And2532, 2112 his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G189><s%> were opened <S%G1272><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the bond <S%G1199><s%> of <S%G1100><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> was loosed <S%G3089><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> plain <S%G3723><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> the more <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G846><s%> charged <S%G1291><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, so much the more <S%G3123><s%> a great deal <S%G4054><s%> they published it <S%G2784><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G1605><s%> beyond measure <S%G5249><s%> astonished <S%G1605><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, He hath done <S%G4160><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>; he maketh <S%G4160><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the dumb <S%G216><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>.
